content: africa is a beautiful continent and whether you ve already been there or dream to go one day you can have it now at home on your knees you can also prevent your kid from immapancy when it s wrapped in a nice map right from the beginning a vintage-map-style baby blanket will add a spirit of adventure to your space easy to follow graphic crochet pattern with pictures to make this beautiful soft and cozy blanket with map of africa the pattern uses c2c crochet technique which is not at all complicated and is clearly explained on the videos links in pattern you will need 2 main colors of worsted weight yarn and a few yards of additional color just for the border happy crocheting
